Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

9 namespace Kassiopeia
10 {
11 
12  //0 is time
13  //1 is length
14  //2 is x component of position
15  //3 is y component of position
16  //4 is z component of position
17 
18  KSMagneticField* KSTrajElectricParticle::fMagneticFieldCalculator = NULL;
19  KSElectricField* KSTrajElectricParticle::fElectricFieldCalculator = NULL;
20  double KSTrajElectricParticle::fMass = 0.;
21  double KSTrajElectricParticle::fCharge = 0.;
22 
23  KSTrajElectricParticle::KSTrajElectricParticle() :
24  fTime( 0. ),
25  fLength( 0. ),
26  fPosition( 0., 0., 0. ),
27  fMomentum( 0., 0., 0. ),
28  fVelocity( 0., 0., 0. ),
29  fLorentzFactor( 0. ),
30  fKineticEnergy( 0. ),
31 
32  fMagneticField( 0., 0., 0. ),
33  fElectricField( 0., 0., 0. ),
34  fMagneticGradient( 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0. ),
35  fElectricPotential( 0. ),
36 
37  fGuidingCenter( 0., 0., 0. ),
38  fLongMomentum( 0. ),
39  fTransMomentum( 0. ),
40  fLongVelocity( 0. ),
41  fTransVelocity( 0. ),
42  fCyclotronFrequency( 0. ),
43  fOrbitalMagneticMoment( 0. ),
44 
45  fGetMagneticFieldPtr( &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateMagneticField ),
46  fGetElectricFieldPtr( &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateElectricField ),
47  fGetMagneticGradientPtr( &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient ),
48  fGetElectricPotentialPtr( &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential )
49  {
50  }
51  KSTrajElectricParticle::~KSTrajElectricParticle()
52  {
53  }

56  //assignment
57  //**********
58 
59  void KSTrajElectricParticle::PullFrom( const KSParticle& aParticle )
60  {
61  //trajmsg_debug( "magnetic particle pulling from particle:" << ret )
62 
63  if( fMagneticFieldCalculator != aParticle.GetMagneticFieldCalculator() )
64  {
65  //trajmsg_debug( " magnetic calculator differs" << ret )
66  fMagneticFieldCalculator = aParticle.GetMagneticFieldCalculator();
67 
68  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateMagneticField;
69  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient;
70  }
71 
72  if( fElectricFieldCalculator != aParticle.GetElectricFieldCalculator() )
73  {
74  //trajmsg_debug( " electric calculator differs" << ret )
75  fElectricFieldCalculator = aParticle.GetElectricFieldCalculator();
76 
77  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateElectricField;
78  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential;
79  }
80 
81  if( GetMass() != aParticle.GetMass() )
82  {
83  //trajmsg_debug( " mass differs" << ret )
84  fMass = aParticle.GetMass();
85  }
86 
87  if( GetCharge() != aParticle.GetCharge() )
88  {
89  //trajmsg_debug( " charge differs" << ret )
90  fCharge = aParticle.GetCharge();
91  }
92 
93  if( GetTime() != aParticle.GetTime() || GetPosition() != aParticle.GetPosition() )
94  {
95  //trajmsg_debug( " time or position differs" << ret )
96 
97  fTime = aParticle.GetTime();
98  fLength = aParticle.GetLength();
99  fPosition = aParticle.GetPosition();
100 
101  fData[ 0 ] = fTime;
102  fData[ 1 ] = fLength;
103  fData[ 2 ] = fPosition.X();
104  fData[ 3 ] = fPosition.Y();
105  fData[ 4 ] = fPosition.Z();
106 
107  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateMagneticField;
108  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateElectricField;
109  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient;
110  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential;
111  }
112 
113  //trajmsg_debug( " time: <" << GetTime() << ">" << eom )
114  //trajmsg_debug( " length: <" << GetLength() << ">" << eom )
115  //trajmsg_debug( " position: <" << GetPosition().X() << ", " << GetPosition().Y() << ", " << GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
116  //trajmsg_debug( " momentum: <" << GetMomentum().X() << ", " << GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
117 
118  return;
119  }
120  void KSTrajElectricParticle::PushTo( KSParticle& aParticle )
121  {
122  //trajmsg_debug( "magnetic particle pushing to particle:" << eom )
123 
124  aParticle.SetTime( GetTime() );
125  aParticle.SetLength( GetLength() );
126  aParticle.SetPosition( GetPosition() );
127  aParticle.SetMomentum( GetMomentum() );
128 
129  if( fGetMagneticFieldPtr == &KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing )
130  {
131  aParticle.SetMagneticField( GetMagneticField() );
132  }
133  if( fGetElectricFieldPtr == &KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing )
134  {
135  aParticle.SetElectricField( GetElectricField() );
136  }
137  if( fGetMagneticGradientPtr == &KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing )
138  {
139  aParticle.SetMagneticGradient( GetMagneticGradient() );
140  }
141  if( fGetElectricPotentialPtr == &KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing )
142  {
143  aParticle.SetElectricPotential( GetElectricPotential() );
144  }
145 
146  //trajmsg_debug( " time: <" << GetTime() << ">" << eom )
147  //trajmsg_debug( " length: <" << GetLength() << ">" << eom )
148  //trajmsg_debug( " position: <" << GetPosition().X() << ", " << GetPosition().Y() << ", " << GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
149  //trajmsg_debug( " momentum: <" << GetMomentum().X() << ", " << GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
150 
151  return;
152  }
153

158  void KSTrajElectricParticle::SetMagneticFieldCalculator( KSMagneticField* anMagneticField )
159  {
160  fMagneticFieldCalculator = anMagneticField;
161  return;
162  }
163  KSMagneticField* KSTrajElectricParticle::GetMagneticFieldCalculator()
164  {
165  return fMagneticFieldCalculator;
166  }

169  {
170  fElectricFieldCalculator = anElectricField;
171  return;
172  }
173  KSElectricField* KSTrajElectricParticle::GetElectricFieldCalculator()
174  {
175  return fElectricFieldCalculator;
176  }

182  void KSTrajElectricParticle::SetMass( const double& aMass )
183  {
184  fMass = aMass;
185  return;

187  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetMass()
188  {
189  return fMass;

193  {
194  fCharge = aCharge;

198  {
199  return fCharge;

205 
206  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetTime() const
207  {
208  fTime = fData[ 0 ];
209  return fTime;
210  }
211  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetLength() const
212  {
213  fLength = fData[ 1 ];
214  return fLength;
215  }
216  const KThreeVector& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetPosition() const
217  {
218  fPosition.SetComponents( fData[ 2 ], fData[ 3 ], fData[ 4 ] );
219  return fPosition;
220  }
221  const KThreeVector& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetMomentum() const
222  {
223  fMomentum = GetMass() * GetVelocity() * GetLorentzFactor();
224  return fMomentum;
225  }
226  const KThreeVector& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetVelocity() const
227  {
228  fVelocity = GetElectricField().Unit();
229  return fVelocity;
230  }
231  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetLorentzFactor() const
232  {
233  fLorentzFactor = 1. / sqrt( 1. - GetVelocity().MagnitudeSquared() / (KConst::C() * KConst::C()) );
234  return fLorentzFactor;
235  }
236  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetKineticEnergy() const
237  {
238  fKineticEnergy = GetMomentum().MagnitudeSquared() / ((1. + GetLorentzFactor()) * fMass);
239  return fKineticEnergy;
240  }
241 
242  const KThreeVector& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetMagneticField() const
243  {
244  (this->*fGetMagneticFieldPtr)();
245  return fMagneticField;
246  }
247  const KThreeVector& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetElectricField() const
248  {
249  (this->*fGetElectricFieldPtr)();
250  return fElectricField;
251  }
252  const KThreeMatrix& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetMagneticGradient() const
253  {
254  (this->*fGetMagneticGradientPtr)();
255  return fMagneticGradient;
256  }
257  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetElectricPotential() const
258  {
259  (this->*fGetElectricPotentialPtr)();
260  return fElectricPotential;
261  }
262 
263  const KThreeVector& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetGuidingCenter() const
264  {
265  fGuidingCenter = GetPosition();
266  return fGuidingCenter;
267  }
268  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetLongMomentum() const
269  {
270  fLongMomentum = GetMomentum().Magnitude();
271  return fLongMomentum;
272  }
273  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetTransMomentum() const
274  {
275  fTransMomentum = 0.;
276  return fTransMomentum;
277  }
278  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetLongVelocity() const
279  {
280  fLongVelocity = GetVelocity().Magnitude();
281  return fLongVelocity;
282  }
283  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetTransVelocity() const
284  {
285  fTransVelocity = 0.;
286  return fTransVelocity;
287  }
288  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetCyclotronFrequency() const
289  {
290  fCyclotronFrequency = (fabs( fCharge ) * GetMagneticField().Magnitude()) / (2. * KConst::Pi() * GetLorentzFactor() * GetMass());
291  return fCyclotronFrequency;
292  }
293  const double& KSTrajElectricParticle::GetOrbitalMagneticMoment() const
294  {
295  fOrbitalMagneticMoment = 0.;
296  return fOrbitalMagneticMoment;
297  }

299  //*****
300  //cache
301  //*****
302 
303  void KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing() const
304  {
305  return;
306  }
307  void KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateMagneticField() const
308  {
309  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateField( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fMagneticField );
310  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing;
311  return;
312  }
313  void KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateElectricField() const
314  {
315  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculateField( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fElectricField );
316  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing;
317  return;
318  }
319  void KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient() const
320  {
321  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateGradient( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fMagneticGradient );
322  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing;
323  return;
324  }
325  void KSTrajElectricParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential() const
326  {
327  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculatePotential( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fElectricPotential );
328  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajElectricParticle::DoNothing;
329  return;
330  }
